channel.title: Play N64 Online
channel.description:
The Title Says it all, You can emulate a N64 and play Split Screen over a network as if the players are playing the same console.
All you need is [url=http://mupen64.emulation64.com/]Mupen 64[/url] and all players require the same ROM (I am not providing links, use google.com). Download Mupen from [url=http://www.goldeneyeonline.com/downloads/Mupen64%2B%2B_Beta_0.1.3.12.zip]here[/url] as a zip archive to avoid installing Mupen as a program.
The only reason I use it is to play Goldeneye 007 and goldeneyeonline.com provide a good tutorial on setting up the emulator for online use. http://www.goldeneyeonline.com/
Have Fun I am aware this is pretty old but I noticed that there are no topics on this.

item.title: Play N64 Online
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“Davidude, post:2, topic:271665”]That sounds pretty awesome. When I was little and I’d play multiplayer on goldeneye with bots [i think] I used to always wonder if secretly i was playing against real people whom also thought i was a bot.

Ah memories.[/quote]

Wow I think you should keep that to yourself in future. Lel.

Read full topic

item.title: Play N64 Online
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Fat Cookies, post:6, topic:271665”]@Copper
It seems that Mupen is one of the most stable N64 emulators with NetPlay. In addition most people that play proper N64 games (Goldeneye, PD) use Mupen.[/quote]
cooper*
Oh okay.

Read full topic

item.title: Play N64 Online
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Chassy13:

Would this work for Perfect Dark?

It should work but the fps might be affected. The standard Goldeneye NTSC ROM is 96Mbit while Perfect Dark is 256MBit.
I might make a topic on clan board so we all can use the same server. Im currently using “Recoil’s EmuLinker Server” (92.51.138.220:27888) because my ping is 16ms

@Cooper (Copper lol)
It seems that Mupen is one of the most stable N64 emulators with NetPlay. In addition most people that play proper N64 games (Goldeneye, PD) use Mupen.

Read full topic

item.title: Play N64 Online
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Don’t know about his method, but any emulator with Kaillera support can play online.

en.wikipedia.org

Kaillera | Emulators with Kaillera support

1.1964 (Nintendo 64 a.k.a. N64) | 2.Atari800Win PLus (Atari 8-bit family) | 3.Bliss (Intellivision) | 4.CCS64 (Commodore 64) | 5.Demul (Sega Dreamcast, Sega NAOMI, Sega NAOMI 2, Atomiswave, Hikaru, Cave, Gaelco) | 6.DolphinNP, a modified version of Dolphin (Nintendo GameCube, Nintendo Wii) | 7.Emukon (Sega Game Gear, Sega Master System) | 8.ePSXe (Sony PlayStation a.k.a. PS1) *Requires a Netplay plugin such as CyberPad or PS4NET. | 9.Final Burn Alpha (CPS-1, CPS-2, Neo Geo MVS) | 10.Gens...

Read full topic
